    Megatron turned to look at the retreating Predacons. Why in the Inferno 
did they even bother fighting now? He was still confused....wh they were 
here....and what they were doing..
    "Argh! Predacons fall back, but I want the Allience to suffer!" He said, 
and then released as much firepower as his circuts could withstand.
